metadata.title: CVE-2016-9857 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. XSS is possible because of aweakness in a regular expression used in some JavaScript processing. All4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
